set(THIS_PROJECT lua)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set(LUA_SRC_ROOT "${SDK_DIR}/lua-5.1.1")

set (SourceGroup_Root

	${LUA_SRC_ROOT}/src/lapi.h

	${LUA_SRC_ROOT}/src/print.c
)


set (SourceGroup_RootLuac
	${LUA_SRC_ROOT}/src/luac.c
)
source_group("RootLuac" FILES ${SourceGroup_RootLuac})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root} ${SourceGroup_RootLuac}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST


include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/Lua/src )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} STATIC ${SOURCES})

#USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "StdAfx.h" "StdAfx.cpp" )

###SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
